StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoon_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorMoonIcon] Thulium Moon

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoon_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World with an artificial moon created from a Thulium node. Shipyards sponsored by this world gain additional Hit Points.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloud_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorCloudIcon] Durantium Cloud

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloud_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World with a cloud of captured Durantium Asteroids. Shipyards sponsored by this world gain a bonus to any Mass Drivers ships produced.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAccelerator_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorAcceleratorIcon] Precursor Accelerator

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAccelerator_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World with immense Promethion Accelerator orbiting it. Shipyards sponsored by this world will build faster ships.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellites_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorSatellitesIcon] Precursor Satellites

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellites_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World with an advanced array of orbiting satellites. These satellites give the planet a larger sensor range and boost the sensor range of any ship built by its shipyard.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevator_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorElevatorIcon] Precursor Elevator

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevator_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World with an intact Space Elevator that greatly increases its efficiency of a sponsored shipyard.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefinery_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorRefineryIcon] Promethion Refinery World

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefinery_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World created by mining out a Promethion Planet, Shipyards sponsored by this world will have greatly increased range.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorld_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorFactoryIcon] Precursor Factory World

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World, with a vast orbital factory rings. That greatly increases the manufacturing potential of the world.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorld_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorResearchIcon] Precursor Research World

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world with intact precursor bases in orbit that can greatly increase the Research potential of any colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasury_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorWealthIcon] Precursor Treasury

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasury_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World with a vast orbiting ring that is full of ancient and valuable resources. It will greatly increase the wealth of any colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantine_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorQuarantineIcon] Precursor Quarantine

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantine_Dec
StringTable.String: A once wealthy world quarantined by the Precursors. What remains is so toxic that it is uncolonizable without work.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorld_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorExperimentalIcon] Precursor Experimental World

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A world thought to have been used by the Precursors for dangerous experimentation. It will take a great deal of work to make it safe to colonize.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrison_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=PrecursorPrisonIcon] Precursor Prison

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrison_Dec
StringTable.String: A mysterious world that was once used as a Precursor Prison. Its atmosphere has been poisoned, making it impossible to colonize without a great deal of work
